description: Apply a matrix to a dataset, voxel-by-voxel, to produce a new dataset.

input_matrix.title: Input Matrix
input_matrix.description: The matrix to be applied, specified as a .1D file or as an expression in the syntax of 1dmatcalc.

mask.title: Mask
mask.description: Apply the matrix only to voxels in the mask; other voxels will be set to all zeroes.
